name: DB Connector
tagline: Read out meta data from DBs
body:
Simple SWT application to read out meta data from DBs and perform SQL queries. I had originally implemented this back in 2005.

![screenshot](images/dbconnector.png)

Download the program from [here](download/dbconnector.jar) and execute the jar either by double click or with java -jar dbconnector.jar.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
